Name: CAUTION & WARNING
checklistText:
<size=21>CAUTION & WARNING ARRAY CHECKOUT</size>

1.
PANEL 16:	CB INST: CWEA - open
PANEL 2:	C/W PWR caut lt - on

2.
PANEL 3:	LTG: LAMP/TONE TEST sel - C/W 1
PANEL 1:	Left bank warn lts - on

3.
PANEL 3:	LTG: LAMP/TONE TEST sel - ENG PB C/W 2
PANEL 1:	Left bank warn lts - off
	Right bank warn lts - on
PANEL 5:	Eng START pb/lt - on
PANEL 5,6:	Eng STOP pb/lt - on

4.
PANEL 3:	LTG: LAMP/TONE TEST sel - C/W 3
PANEL 1:	Right bank warn lts - off
PANEL 2:	Left bank warn lts - on
PANEL 5:	Eng START pb/lt - off
PANEL 5,6:	Eng STOP pb/lt - off

5.
PANEL 3:	LTG: LAMP/TONE TEST sel - C/W 4
PANEL 2:	Left bank warn lts - off
PANEL 2:	Right bank warn lts - on

6.
PANEL 3:	LTG: LAMP/TONE TEST sel - COMPNT
PANEL 2:	Right bank warn lts - off, except C&W lt - on
PANEL 8:	ED:
		STAGE SEQ RLY SYS A comp caut lt - on
		STAGE SEQ RLY SYS B comp caut lt - on
PANEL 14:	EPS:
		BAT FAULT lt - on
		DC FEEDER FAULT comp caut lt - on
PANEL 2:	SUIT FAN comp caut lt - on
	GLYCOL comp caut lt - on
	CO2 comp caut lt - on
	H2O SEP comp caut lt - on
PANEL 3:	RNDZ RADAR: NO TRACK lt - on
PANEL 1,3:	LUNAR CONTACT lt (2) - on

7.
PANEL 3:	LTG: LAMP/TONE TEST sel - OFF
	All lts in step 6 - off

8.
PANEL 16:	CB INST: CWEA - close
PANEL 2:	C/W PWR caut lt - off
	RCS A REG warn lt - on
	RCS B REG warn lt - on
	ECS caut lt - on
	GLYCOL caut lt - on (if glycol temp > 50F)
	H2O SEP comp caut lt - on
	SUIT FAN comp caut lt - on

9.
PANEL 16:	CB LTG: MASTER ALARM - close
PANEL 1,2:	MASTER ALARM - on
	MASTER ALARM pb/lt - reset
